title: 3 and Out - Deshaun's Trade Demand; Brady's Greatest Traits; Texans Total Rebuild; Aaron Rodgers Leverage; Rams/Goff Gettin' Ugly
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Deshaun's Trade Demand; Brady's Greatest Traits; Texans Total Rebuild; Aaron Rodgers Leverage; Rams/Goff Gettin' Ugly
description:
In this episode, John discusses Deshaun Watson ending speculation by formally demanding a trade, why he views the Texans hire of lifetime assistant David Culley as a stop gap coach heading into a total rebuild, which traits make Tom Brady the G.O.A.T., and why Aaron Rodgers has massive leverage over the Packers. He also explains why things are getting really ugly between the Rams and Jared Goff and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
